General.Name: Pierre et Vacances SA
General.Description: Pierre et Vacances SA, through its subsidiaries, engages in the holiday accommodation and holiday property investment business in Europe and internationally. It operates through two segments, Property Development and Tourism. The Property Development engages in the land prospection, site design, construction, and marketing of holiday residences for individual buyers or institutional buyers. The Tourism segment operates residences and villages marketed under the Pierre & Vacances, Center Parcs, Sunparks, Villages, Nature Paris, Maeva.com, and Adagio brands. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Paris, France. Pierre et Vacances SA is a subsidiary of Société d'Investissement Touristique et Immobilier.
